channel.title: Testscape based server wont let me make myself admin
channel.description: Well I have a testscape based server but it wont let me make my self admin. I make my player rites 3 but nothing hapens

item.title: Testscape based server wont let me make myself admin
item.dc:creator: @crakaman crakaman
item.description:
@crakaman wrote:

ok this is how you do it first search for this under client.java

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

you should see something like this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hybrid”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kingplaya”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

in there just change the name’s to yours and put what player rights you want that should do it worked for me

Read full topic
item.source: Testscape based server wont let me make myself admin

item.title: Testscape based server wont let me make myself admin
item.dc:creator: @godtrix godtrix
item.description:
@godtrix wrote:

i had the same problem, go to the same folder again and you may see someones name inside brackets then 3 next to their name, change the name inside the brackets to your name. Sorry if its not very helpful but i tried
